channel.title: WoW [ Gm Chatting ]
channel.description:
Lol i got banned from WoW because of this all hated GM HGAHAHAH!!!
5:50 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Greetings. This is Game Master Bekyn. May I have a moment of your time? 5:50 AM To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Sure. 5:50 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: How has your night been? 5:50 AM To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Uhh... Pretty good. Why? 5:51 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: What are you doing at this moment? 5:51 AM To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Just getting ready to auction off some stuff. 5:51 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Do you think you will make money off of it? 5:51 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Yeah. Why? 5:52 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Well, I regret to inform you that you will not see that money. 5:52 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Err.. Why? Did the AH just explode or something? 5:52 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: No. 5:52 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Then, wtf? 5:52 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Well, are you eating anything? 5:53 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: wtf does that have to do with anything. and yes, I'm eating a donut. 5:53 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Mmmmm... I like donuts. Can I have one? 5:53 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: No, I'm hungry. 5:54 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Oh that makes me sad. But not as sad as it makes me to tell you that you will not be able to access this game on this account again. 5:54 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Motherfucker. You are really pissed that I didn't give you that donut! lrn2geturownfood 5:54 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: You need to lrn2bot nub. 5:54 To <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Eh. Fuck you. 5:54 AM <GM>|Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: No thanks. I'm married.
~Home

item.title: WoW [ Gm Chatting ]
item.dc:creator: @Home Home
item.description:
@Home wrote:

Lol i got banned from WoW because of this all hated GM HGAHAHAH!!!

5:50 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Greetings. This is Game Master Bekyn. May I have a moment of your time?
5:50 AM To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Sure.
5:50 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: How has your night been?
5:50 AM To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Uhh… Pretty good. Why?
5:51 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: What are you doing at this moment?
5:51 AM To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Just getting ready to auction off some stuff.
5:51 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Do you think you will make money off of it?
5:51 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Yeah. Why?
5:52 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Well, I regret to inform you that you will not see that money.
5:52 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Err… Why? Did the AH just explode or something?
5:52 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: No.
5:52 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Then, wtf?
5:52 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Well, are you eating anything?
5:53 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: wtf does that have to do with anything. and yes, I’m eating a donut.
5:53 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Mmmmm… I like donuts. Can I have one?
5:53 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: No, I’m hungry.
5:54 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: Oh that makes me sad. But not as sad as it makes me to tell you that you will not be able to access this game on this account again.
5:54 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Motherfucker. You are really pissed that I didn’t give you that donut! lrn2geturownfood
5:54 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: You need to lrn2bot nub.
5:54 To |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h: Eh. Fuck you.
5:54 AM |Hplayer:Bekyn|h[Bekyn]|h whispers: No thanks. I’m married.

~Home
